heading: Rule #1
content: There must be three (3) people per designated room. Please ensure that your roommates are of the same university and of similar gender. Should there be any concerns with the number of people allowed inside the room, please inform the TWG.

heading: Rule #2
content: Please be punctual. Arrive on time for sessions and adhere to the schedule. The program flow is attached to the event primer attached upon registration.

heading: Rule #3
content: Please dress appropriately for the conference setting. The preferred attires per program are included in the event primer.

heading: Rule #4
content: Please wear your MISSCON 2025 IDs visibly at all times for easier identification.

heading: Rule #5
content: Please adhere to the hotel guidelines. Maintain cleanliness inside and outside the venue, and do not litter.

heading: Rule #6
content: We highly encourage you to bring your own tumblers during the conference. Ateneo de Davao University follows the no SUPs policy.
